item.title: Augmented Blogging - The Art of Prompting
The pillars of a sustainable energy future - A fireside chat
item.description: This blog post is interesting in more than one way, because … I am going to discuss a topic that is deer to my heart: What do we need to do to get to a better place with respect to a sustainable energy future? And I am going to use a new approach: Where I am first going to articulate my thoughts and then I am going to complement it with a fireside chat that I had with chatGPT about the topics at hand.
